groupDetails.description: Monitor a GIT repository and validate PRs, raising JIRA bug and twitter notification if errors found

endpoints.description: The twitter account to send notifications.
endpoints.name: twitter

groupDetails.name: MonitorGITPR

policyDetails.description: This policy will validate a GIT PR.
policyDetails.name: ValidatePR

policyDefinitions.ValidatePR:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><beans xmlns="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans" xmlns:camel="http://camel.apache.org/schema/spring" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="          http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans/spring-beans.xsd          http://camel.apache.org/schema/spring http://camel.apache.org/schema/spring/camel-spring.xsd">

  <camelContext xmlns="http://camel.apache.org/schema/spring">
    <route id="ValidateWSDL">
      <from uri="scepta:gitpr"/>
      <choice>
        <when>
          <simple>${body.title} == 'invalid'</simple>
          <to uri="scepta:gitprclose"/>
          <setHeader headerName="ProjectKey">
            <constant>TEST</constant>       
          </setHeader>
          <setHeader headerName="IssueTypeId">
            <constant>1</constant>       
          </setHeader>
          <setHeader headerName="IssueSummary">
            <simple>INVALID PULL REQUEST: Pull request #${body.number}</simple>
          </setHeader>
          <transform>
            <simple>INVALID PULL REQUEST: Pull request #${body.number} failed validation! ${body.htmlUrl}</simple>
          </transform>
          <multicast parallelProcessing="true" >
            <to uri="scepta:gitprcomment"/>
            <to uri="scepta:twitter"/>
            <to uri="scepta:jira"/>
          </multicast>
        </when>
        <otherwise>
          <transform>
            <simple>VALID PULL REQUEST: Pull request #${body.number} successful validation! ${body.htmlUrl}</simple>
          </transform>
          <to uri="scepta:gitprcomment"/>
        </otherwise>
      </choice>
    </route>
  </camelContext>

</beans>
